column2: "Israel
column3: tsie: rubotwa Jordan ndɛ da yi
column4: akɔ akɛfa amanaman a wɔyɛ akɛse na wɔyɛ dzen sen ɔwoara
column5: nkurow akɛse a wɔatotow ho afasu edu sor
column9: na atse dɛ wɔka no hɔn ho dɛ
column10: Woana na obotum egyina Anak mbabanyin no enyim?"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hu ndɛ da yi
column3: dɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn nye nyia odzi w'enyim rukotwa dɛ ogya a ɔmemen; ɔbɛsɛɛ hɔn
column4: na ɔabrɛ hɔn adze wɔ w'enyim ma eetu hɔn
column6: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE aka akyerɛ wo no."

column2: "EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enya etu hɔn efi w'enyim egu no
column3: mma nnka wɔ w'akoma mu dɛ
column4: Me ndzeyɛtsenenee ntsi na EWURADZE dze me aba dɛ mebɛfa asaase yi: naaso na amanaman yi hɔn ndzebɔnyɛ ntsi na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn rutu hɔn efi w'enyim."

column2: "Nnyɛ wo ndzeyɛtsenenee
column3: anaa w'akoma ne tsenenee ntsi na erokɔ akɛfa hɔn asaase: mbom amanaman yi hɔn ndzebɔnyɛ ntsi na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn rutu hɔn efi w'enyim
column4: na ɔaama asɛm a ɔkaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ w'egyanom

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hu dɛ nnyɛ wo ndzeyɛtsenenee bi ntsi na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze asaase pa yi rema wo dɛ fa; na ɔman akɔnkyefo nye wo."
"Kaa
column4: mbrɛ isii yii EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ebufuw wɔ sar no do; ofi da a ifii Egypt asaase do edze bodur dɛ hom baa bea yi do yi
column5: hom atsew etua wɔ EWURADZE do."

column2: "Na Horeb so hom yii EWURADZE ebufuw
column3: na EWURADZE no bo fuuw hom dɛ nkyɛ ɔbɛsɛɛ hom."

column2: "Aber a mofoow bepɔw no dɛ merekɛgye abopon no
column3: mekyerɛ ahyɛmu a EWURADZE nye hom dzii n'apon no
column4: nna metsenaa bepɔw no do adaduanan adzekyee nye adzesaa; menndzi edziban mannom nsu so."

column2: "Na EWURADZE dze abopon ebien a wɔdze Nyankopɔn nsatseaba akyerɛw do no maa me; na no do na wɔakyerɛw nsɛm no nyinara a ofi gya mu wɔ bepɔw no do nye hom kasae wɔ nguabɔ da no mu no."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ adaduanan adzekyee nye adzesaa n'ewiei no
"Na EWURADZE see me dɛ
column4: fi ha sian ntsɛm; na wo man a ikeyii hɔn wɔ Egypt no asɛɛ hɔnho; wɔadan efi ɔkwan a mehyɛɛ hɔn no do ntsɛm; wɔayɛ ohonyi a woegu ama hɔnho."

column2: "Nkyii so EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ me dɛ
"gyaa me ma mensɛɛ hɔn
column3: na mempepa hɔn dzin mfi ɔsor ase: na menyɛ wo ɔman a ɔyɛ dzen na ɔso sen hɔn."

column2: "Nna medanee na mifii bepɔw no do sianee
column3: na bepɔw no dzɛɛw gya: nna ahyɛmu apon ebien no kitsakitsa me nsamu."

column2: "Na mohwɛe
column5: hom ayɛ bɔn etsia EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn; hom ayɛ ɔnantwiba a woegu ama hom ho: hom adan efi ɔkwan a EWURADZE hyɛɛ hom no do afa nkyɛn ntsɛm."

column2: "Na musuoo apon ebien no mu
column3: na motowee fii me nsa ebien no mu gui
column4: na mobobɔɔ no wɔ hom enyim."

column2: "Na mohwee ase wɔ EWURADZE enyim
column4: adaduanan adzekyee nye adzesaa; menndzi edziban
column5: mannom nsu so; osian hom bɔn nyinara a hom yɛe no ntsi
column6: dɛ wɔyɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do

column2: "Na musuroo ebufuw nye ebufuhyew a EWURADZE nyaa no hom ho dɛ ɔdze rebɛsɛɛ hom no. Na EWURADZE tsiee me aber no mu so."
"Na EWURADZE nyaa Aaron ho ebufuw dodoodow dɛ nkyɛ ɔbɛsɛɛ no; na mepaa kyɛw maa Aaron so aber no ara mu."
"Na mefaa hom bɔn a ɔyɛ ɔnantwiba no a hom yɛe no
column5: nyaam no mokomoko kodur dɛ ɔyɛɛ fekɔfekɔ dɛ huntuma: na motoow no huntuma no guu ɔwora no a ofi bepɔw no do pem no mu."

column2: "Na Tabera
column4: nye Kibrot-hataava so hom yii EWURADZE ebufuw."

column2: "Na aber a EWURADZE somaa hom fi Kades-barnea
column4: Hom mfow nkɛfa asaase a medze mama hom no
column5: nna hom tseew etua wɔ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn mbrasɛm do

column2: "Hom ayɛ EWURADZE do etuatsewfo ara fi da a muhun hom no."
"Dɛm ntsi na mohwee ase wɔ EWURADZE enyim adzekyee nye adzesaa adaduanan; osiandɛ EWURADZE ase dɛ ɔrebɛsɛɛ hom."
"Na mepaa EWURADZE kyɛw
column5: mma nnsɛɛ wo man nye w'egyapadze a enam wo kɛseyɛ do apon hɔn a edze nsa a ɔyɛ dzen eyi hɔn wɔ Egypt no."

column2: "Kaa wo nkowaa
column5: nye Jakob; mma nnhwɛ ɔman yi hɔn asoɔdzen

column2: "ɔno bɛyɛ na asaase a iyii hɔn fii do no ase dɛ
column3: Osiandɛ EWURADZE enntum ammfa hɔn annkɔ asaase a ɔbɔɔ hɔn ho anohoba no do
column5: na ɔdze hɔn efir edzi dɛ orukokuku hɔn wɔ sar no do."

column2: "Naaso wɔyɛ wo man nye w'egyapadze a enam wo tum kɛse nye w'abasa a wɔatsɛw mu do eyi hɔn."
